parameter.name: Input image
parameter.description: 3D volume dataset with dimension indicated by the filename (x*y*z), with no header

parameter.name: Output image
parameter.description: Where to store the tracing results. The MDL skeletonization module currently supports output to .vtk or .swc file formats.

parameter.name: Connected components size
parameter.description: Used to remove objects smaller than this volume size. Use higher values for larger noisy objects.
